item.description: Into the Mind Into the Mind explores how humans learn about the world, why we organise as societies, and how we can structure these ideas - wait, what are ideas!? Think Pythonically Other tutorials will teach you python.

item.title: Think Pythonically
item.description: Preface Think Pythonically is a Python tutorial, but unlike other tutorials, here the focus is not on the syntax, but how to think about code in Python.
